A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
We was so excited to see this film\, but you killed the core of star wars. There is so many things that was left in the air from the 7th film...

We grew up with...what will Luke do\, how will he react or do.. You broke the IDEA of skywalkers... I will not raise my kids to be hard core star wars  fans like I was if you don't fix this in the next film.  Hope you listen to us and create a masterpiece in episode 9. 

May the force be with you\, because your going to need it!
